quotes.quote: According to popular legend, Captain Peter Wallace (Willis) was the first European to harbor inside the barrier reef along the coast of present-day Belize. His base of operations was said to be founded in 1638 near the mouth of the Belize River. Wallace captained the Swallow, out of Tortuga Island, and Swallow Cay off the coast of Belize City is said to have been named after his ship.
quotes.act: Wallace (Willis) first European to harbour inside the barrier reef et founds base of operations near the mouth of the river
